Title: Cair Andros
Text: Faramir the Captain of Gondor has aks me about help in Cair Andros!The old city of Gondor has fallen into the hands of the Orcs of Mordor!I have to meet him at the north bridge, The Orcs have blocked all other gates..After that we will fight together against the leaders, that must make them retreat.
CompleteText: We've made it! Faramir and me have killed all the Orc Captains together and have reconquered the city Cair Andros!Now the people of Gondor can came back here.I should continue my journey!
